biz.sudden.knowledgeData.competencesManagement.web.controller.impl.icefaces
Class DataScrollingModel

java.lang.Object
  biz.sudden.knowledgeData.competencesManagement.web.controller.impl.icefaces.TableDefaultControllerImpl
      biz.sudden.knowledgeData.competencesManagement.web.controller.impl.icefaces.DataScrollingModel

public class DataScrollingModel
extends TableDefaultControllerImpl

The DataScrollingModel class is used to show how a dataTable data scrolling can be modfied. There are three display modes for the table; default or no scrolling, scrolling and paging.

Scrolling is handled by an attribute on the dataTable component along with a scroll height specification of the scroll viewport

Paging is handle by the dataPaginator component.

Since:
1.7
